pages.backing: Master Poker Skills at ChipMasters - Online Training What is backing? Personal fund Contact Welcome to the Exciting World of Poker Understanding Backing Funds and Their Importance for Players Cashouts Impede Progress: A major factor in slow advancement through poker limits is frequent cashouts. Regular cashouts can set back a player’s progress to the next limit by several months or even longer. Steady Limit Advancement: A backing fund allows players to progress through limits regardless of cashouts or downswings. The rate of climbing the limits is determined solely by the player’s current skill level. Support for Higher Limits: When a player is ready to move up, we provide the necessary conditions. These conditions help players realize their full potential and achieve success in poker. Fast Track to Higher Limits: With optimal conditions and minimal variance, a player can advance from NL20 to NL100 within 2-3 months. After completing the contract, you'll be ready to play independently at mid-level limits with the skills needed for success. No Upfront Costs: Training with the Backing Fund requires no initial financial investment. We cover your play and provide the necessary conditions to move up limits. This way, you can advance through each limit in as little as 2 weeks to 2 months. The Training and Backing Process in Poker Explained Access to Training Materials: Gain access to a dashboard with training videos and statistics, offering excellent conditions for poker improvement. Homework and Game Review: To unlock the next lesson, your coach will review your homework and analyze your online poker gameplay. Regular Performance Evaluations: Every 10k hands, your coach reviews your hand history. If all criteria are met, your balance is topped up to play at a higher limit. Ongoing Development: This cycle repeats continuously, ensuring consistent growth and advancement through poker limits. Submit your request ChipMasters Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +351239251520 E-mail: chipmasters@gmail.com ChipMasters is committed to responsible gaming. To participate you must be 18 years of age. We ask you to gamble with caution and be aware of the potential risks. © 2024 ChipMasters
pages.disclaimer: Learn Poker Strategies at ChipMasters What is backing? Personal fund Contact Welcome to the Thrilling World of Poker Disclaimer Welcome to ChipMasters, your premier online poker school. We are dedicated to providing high-quality poker education and fostering a supportive community for poker enthusiasts of all levels. However, it is important to understand and agree to the following terms and conditions before participating in our programs and using our resources. Age Restriction Participation in ChipMasters’ programs and access to our materials are strictly limited to individuals who are 18 years of age or older. By registering for our services, you confirm that you meet this age requirement. We do not condone or support underage gambling. Responsible Gaming ChipMasters promotes responsible gaming. Poker is a game of skill and strategy, but it also involves risks. It is essential to play responsibly and be aware of the potential financial implications. If you feel that gambling is becoming a problem, we urge you to seek help from professional organizations dedicated to providing support for gambling addiction. No Financial Guarantees While ChipMasters aims to improve your poker skills and knowledge, we do not guarantee financial success or winnings. Poker involves a combination of skill, strategy, and luck. The outcomes of poker games are inherently uncertain, and participants must accept the risks associated with playing poker. Educational Purposes Only All content, including tutorials, guides, and coaching sessions provided by ChipMasters, is intended for educational purposes only. We provide insights and strategies to help you improve your game, but these should not be construed as professional financial advice or gambling endorsements. Third-Party Links ChipMasters’ website may contain links to third-party websites. These links are provided for your convenience, and we do not have control over the content or policies of these websites. We are not responsible for the practices or terms of these third-party sites, and you should review their policies independently. Limitation of Liability ChipMasters and its affiliates are not liable for any losses or damages arising from your participation in our programs or use of our website. This includes direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Participation in poker involves risks, and you agree to assume full responsibility for your actions and decisions. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns regarding this disclaimer or any of our policies, please feel free to contact us at chipmasters@gmail.com. We are here to assist you and provide further information as needed. Thank you for choosing ChipMasters. We wish you the best in your poker journey and remind you to always play responsibly and within your means. ChipMasters Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +351239251520 E-mail: chipmasters@gmail.com ChipMasters is committed to responsible gaming. To participate you must be 18 years of age. pages.fund: ChipMasters: Elevate Your Game with Expert Coaching What is backing? Personal fund Contact Welcome to the Exciting World of Poker POKER FUND: BUILD YOUR OWN FUND WITH OUR SUPPORT If poker is more than just a pastime for you, create your own personal poker fund with ChipMasters and form your own team of players. This opportunity is particularly advantageous for online poker coaches. We handle the lucrative deals, operational tasks, experience sharing, and player balances, allowing you to concentrate on recruiting players and managing their training. You have full control over the fund, and the responsibility for decision-making is entirely yours. Submit your request WE INVITE STAKING POKER FUNDS, POKER SCHOOLS, AND POKER COACHES TO PARTNER WITH US What is the cost of training players at NL2, NL5 - $3, $5, or $15? And how much do players at these limits earn per month - $50, $70, or $100? Now, let's consider mobile club poker apps, where the competition is much weaker. This means an NL2 player from a traditional room can comfortably play at the NL10 limit in apps, and an NL5 player can comfortably play at the NL20 limit. If players enhance their skills, they can play at even higher limits and compete against stronger opponents. Only those who are diligent and forward-thinking can earn as much passively as they do actively by conducting training for a fixed fee. An "active approach" means working here and now. A "passive approach" is the result of cumulative actions and, in the long run, does not depend on immediate efforts. Personal fund Contact Welcome to the Exciting World of Poker Realize Your Poker Dreams with ChipMasters Become a part of our community and embark on your journey to mastering poker. Whether you’re new or seasoned, ChipMasters provides customized coaching to enhance your skills. Get Started Top-Notch Training Skilled Coaches Demonstrated Success Adaptable Learning Join Our Elite Team ChipMasters is always looking for talented individuals to join our team. Whether you're a seasoned player or just starting out, we offer opportunities to grow and excel. Learn valuable insights from top players and coaches. Compete in high-stakes tournaments and challenges. Access exclusive training materials and resources. Collaborate with a community of passionate players. Join us at ChipMasters and take your poker skills to the next level. We're excited to have you on our team! Begin Your Poker Journey Today At ChipMasters, we are dedicated to helping you become the best poker player you can be. Our personalized training programs, expert coaches, and supportive community are here to guide you at every step. Don't delay your progress. Join ChipMasters today and start improving! With our proven methods and committed support, you'll be well on your way to poker success. Let's make your poker dreams come true together. Sign up now and experience the ChipMasters difference. Submit your request 550+ Students Trained 30 Mentors 24/7 Mentor's help 350+ Successful students Why Choose ChipMasters? At ChipMasters, we provide a distinctive learning experience with expert guidance and a supportive environment. Our programs are crafted to help you thrive, regardless of your initial skill level. Here's why ChipMasters is your top choice for poker education: The Benefits of Training with Us: Expert Instructors: Our trainers are professional poker players with extensive experience in playing and teaching. They offer unique insights and strategies. Customized Coaching: We know each player is unique. Our training programs are tailored to your specific needs and objectives, ensuring maximum benefit. Proven Outcomes: Many of our students have achieved great success in poker thanks to our effective training techniques. Comprehensive Courses: Our curriculum covers everything from basic poker rules to advanced strategies. Whether a novice or an expert, you'll find valuable lessons. Interactive Learning: Our platform includes interactive lessons, quizzes, and real-time feedback to enhance your learning and retention. Community Support: Be part of a community of poker enthusiasts. Learn, share, and grow together with fellow students and coaches. Flexible Scheduling: Our online courses fit into your busy life. Learn at your own pace, anytime, anywhere. Constant Updates: Our courses evolve with the poker world. We regularly refresh our content to include the latest strategies and trends. Access to Resources: Enjoy a vast array of resources, including videos, articles, and live webinars, to enrich your learning experience. Join Our Winning Team At ChipMasters, community is key. By joining us, you'll access exclusive resources, competitions, and collaborative opportunities with top players. Exclusive Resources Get access to professional training materials and strategies. Our extensive library includes video tutorials, written guides, and interactive lessons to enhance your skills at every level. Stay current with the latest poker trends and techniques. We continuously update our resources to reflect the newest developments, ensuring you have the most up-to-date knowledge and strategies. Gain insider tips and secrets from top poker players. Our resources include exclusive interviews and breakdowns of their most successful plays, giving you a competitive edge. Competitive Environment Join exclusive tournaments and challenges. We offer a range of competitions tailored to different skill levels, so you can always find a game that suits your abilities and drives you to improve. Test your skills against top players. Our platform connects you with a global community of poker enthusiasts, allowing you to compete and learn from the best. Earn recognition and rewards for your accomplishments. Our tournaments provide not only the excitement of competition but also tangible rewards and accolades to celebrate your progress and victories. Collaborative Learning Grow and learn within a supportive community. Our forums and discussion groups are filled with passionate players eager to share their experiences and advice. Exchange insights and strategies with fellow members. Engage in lively discussions, dissect complex plays, and receive feedback from peers and coaches alike. Build lasting relationships with like-minded individuals. The connections you make can lead to lifelong friendships and valuable networking opportunities within the poker world. pages.privacy-policy: ChipMasters - Expert Poker Coaching Online What is backing? Personal fund Contact Welcome to the Thrilling World of Poker Privacy Policy for ChipMasters Online Poker School Effective Date: 21.03.2024 1. Introduction Welcome to ChipMasters. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website or use our services. 2. Information We Collect We may collect the following types of information: Personal Information: When you sign up for our courses, contact us, or participate in our activities, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment details. Usage Data: We may collect information on how you access and use our website, including your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and the time and date of your visit. 3. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to: Provide, operate, and maintain our services Process transactions and send you related information Improve, personalize, and expand our website and services Communicate with you, including responding to your comments, questions, and requests Send you updates, newsletters, and promotional materials (you can opt out at any time) Monitor and analyze usage and trends to improve your experience Detect, prevent, and address technical issues and fraudulent activities 4. Sharing Your Information We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following situations: With Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing and email delivery. Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities. 5. Data Security We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. 6. Your Rights You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can do so by contacting us at chipmasters@gmail.com. You also have the right to opt out of receiving promotional communications from us. 7. Cookies Our website uses cookies to enhance your experience. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect your ability to use certain features of our site. 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website. Your continued use of our website and services after such modifications will constitute your acknowledgment of the modified policy. 9. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at chipmasters@gmail.com. 10. Acceptance of Terms By using our website and services, you signify your acceptance of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with the policy, please do not use our services. Thank you for choosing ChipMasters. We value your trust and are committed to safeguarding your personal information. ChipMasters Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +351239251520 E-mail: chipmasters@gmail.com ChipMasters is committed to responsible gaming. To participate you must be 18 years of age. We ask you to gamble with caution and be aware of the potential risks. © 2024 ChipMasters
